name: Kangarootime
description: Kangarootime is a leading software platform for childcare service providers to automate processes and connect seamlessly with families. The company raised a $26M Series B in June 2022.

name: Expando
description: ExpandoÂ® is an AI-powered referral software for B2B SaaS companies to leverage APAC's largest partner ecosystem to build a predictable referral pipeline. The company has raised $175k as the first investment in 2023.

name: Rever
description: Rever is a connected frontline worker engagement and innovation enterprise software platform, for people-driven operational excellence. The company has raised more than $4M+ in funding.

name: Climber RMS
description: Climber is a fast-growing Revenue Management Software platform for independent hotel chains. The company has raised more than $800k+ in funding.
